title: Louis Vuitton Twist MM
description: Louis Vuitton Twist MM shoulder bag in blue Epi leather (year 2018). Featuring gold-toned hardware, sliding chain-leather strap to convert from shoulder carry to cross body wear. The front flap with LV twist turn-lock opens to a navy blue microfibre lining interior with a patch pocket and a card slot. Approximate dimensions: 23cm(L) x 17.5cm(H) x 9cm(D), 32-56cm shoulder drop. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
